page.title: 10Libraries on Canford Heath.
page.content: There is one Public Library on Canford Heath with about 2O,OOO books in it.It has been open for years.It is run under the Dewey-Decimal system.There is also a microfiche system which the public can use when they want to find more books and which library they are in.The library is open on each day except on Thursdays,Sundays and Saturday afternoons.The library runs quizzes and competitions which anyone can join in with,as well as a special story time for the younger children visiting the library. There is always a display of pictures by the children from the local schools. We also have a school library which is run the same way as the main library. We borrow books from Dorset County Library so we can increase the choice of books.We can keep them for either a term or for several years.
